Package com.inrupt.client.uma

User Managed Access support for the Inrupt client libraries

UMA builds on the OAuth 2.0 authorization framework, defining a mechanism by which a client can iteratively negotiate for an access token.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClaimGatheringHandler
    A handler capable of gathering claims for a given type, from a given issuer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClaimToken
    This class represents an UMA claim token and the associated type value.
    ErrorResponse  
    Metadata  
    NeedInfo
    A class representing a need_info error response from an UMA server.
    RequiredClaims
    A class representing the required claims that are part of an UMA interactive exchange.
    TokenRequest  
    TokenResponse  
    UmaAuthenticationProvider
    An authentication mechanism that makes use of User Managed Access (UMA) authorization servers.
    UmaClient  
    UmaSession
    A session implementation for use with UMA Authorization Servers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidGrantException  
    InvalidScopeException  
    RequestDeniedException  
    UmaException
    A runtime exception for use with UMA-related errors.
